function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discussion of COVID-19 pandemic and academic experts' role","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation or conflicting advice","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate and verified information is shared, provide clear guidelines for academics","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, communication platforms for sharing verified information","People":"Academics, public","Owner":"Academics, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Call for audio stories about COVID-19 experiences","Impact":"Potential emotional distress or trauma from reliving experiences, potential bias in stories shared","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support for contributors, ensure diverse and balanced representation of experiences","Technologies":"Online mental health resources, data analysis for diversity of experiences","People":"Contributors, listeners","Owner":"Podcast organizers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Global call for academic reports on COVID-19 implications","Impact":"Risk of limited representation and diversity of experiences, potential exclusion of marginalized communities","Mitigation":"Ensure outreach to diverse academic communities, prioritize voices of marginalized groups","Technologies":"Online survey tools, data analysis for diversity and inclusion","People":"Academics, marginalized communities","Owner":"Podcast organizers, academic institutions"}]}
